data.text: Raajiin dubbii Waaqayyoo biyya Hadraakitti ni dhufa;
akkasumas gara Hamaati ishee daangaa irraa,
Gooftaan garuu qabeenya ishee irraa fuudhee humna ishee
Ashqaloon waan kana argitee ni sodaatti;
Ani dhiiga afaan isaanii keessa jiru,
Yaa Intala Xiyoon ati guddisii gammadi!
Siʼi immoo, sababii dhiiga kakuu ani si wajjin qabuutiif
Yaa hidhamtoota abdii qabdan, daʼannoo keessanitti deebiʼaa;
Ani akkan iddaa koo dabsadhutti Yihuudaa dabsee
Waaqayyo Waan Hunda Dandaʼu isaan eega.
Akkuma tikseen bushaayee isaa oolchu sana,
Isaan akkam nama hawwatu! Akkamis miidhagu!
